models.name: WaveNet
models.description: A deep generative model of raw audio waveforms, capable of producing high-fidelity audio.

models.name: DeepSpeech
models.description: An open-source speech recognition engine based on deep learning, developed by Mozilla.

models.name: SoundNet
models.description: A deep learning model for audio classification tasks, trained on a large dataset of YouTube videos.

models.name: OpenAI Jukebox
models.description: A neural network that generates music in a variety of genres and styles.

models.name: VGGish
models.description: A model for audio classification based on the VGG architecture, adapted for audio data.
